name: winemaking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of producing wine: He has published more than 50 books on wine and winemaking. Corsica has a long history of wine making. Their immigrant father came to America from Italy's famed winemaking region of Piedmont. They brought European winemaking techniques to the vineyards of the Napa Valley.
More examplesFewer examples The winemaking is already in full swing at Chatham Hill Winery.He met with scientists at the University of California department of viticulture and enology (the study of grape-growing and winemaking).Wine making has been a part of Chilean daily life since the mid 1500s.A certain amount of oxygen is needed during the wine making process.
